```py
>>> import numpy.ma as ma
>>> x = ma.masked_equal([0, 1, 0, 2, 3], 0)
>>> x
masked_array(data=[--, 1, --, 2, 3],
 mask=[ True, False,  True, False, False],
 fill_value=0)
>>> ma.is_masked(x)
True
>>> x = ma.masked_equal([0, 1, 0, 2, 3], 42)
>>> x
masked_array(data=[0, 1, 0, 2, 3],
 mask=False,
 fill_value=42)
>>> ma.is_masked(x)
False 
```

```py
>>> x = [False, True, False]
>>> ma.is_masked(x)
False
>>> x = 'a string'
>>> ma.is_masked(x)
False 
```
